title: Remove Government Notifications & Circulars section

requirements.text: Remove the Government Notifications & Circulars section from the website. This includes: (1) removing the <Notifications /> component from App.tsx, (2) removing the corresponding navigation link/entry from Navigation.tsx if one exists for this section, and (3) ensuring the page layout remains visually coherent after removal.
acceptanceCriteria: The Notifications component is no longer rendered anywhere on the page.
No broken layout or empty whitespace gap appears where the section previously existed.
The navigation bar no longer contains a link to the Notifications/Circulars section.
All other page sections continue to render correctly.

constraints: Do not remove or modify the Notifications.tsx component file itself â€” only remove its usage from App.tsx and any navigation references.
Do not alter any other page sections or components unrelated to the Notifications section.
nonGoals: Removing the backend notification logic or data model.
Modifying the GovernmentResources component or any other section.
